description: Smallest palindrome greater than n in bases 2 and n.
mathematica: Do[ k = n +1; While[ RealDigits[ k, n ][ [ 1 ] ] != Reverse[ RealDigits[ k, n ][ [ 1 ] ] ] || RealDigits[ k, 2 ][ [ 1 ] ] != Reverse[ RealDigits[ k, 2 ][ [ 1 ] ] ], k++ ]; Print[ k ], {n, 2, 60} ]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 15 2000
